SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.network

Interface NetworkManagerServer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerNetworkRMIManager, ServerNetworkTCPManager
public interface NetworkManagerServer
Interface NetworkManagerServer ensures methods to manage the communications on the network and to handle incoming requests from clients
